name: SuperFeria
description:
In this action game, your goal is to capture as many coins as possible, which appear randomly.

However, the mission will not be simple, since you will be constantly besieged by missiles that follow your position. You will also have to deal with annoying robots that will advance throughout the level trying to collide with you. Good luck and be careful!

Don't forget to send and share your record!

Thanks for downloading the game!

HTML5 Version (PC & Mobile):

https://www.sultanagames.com/games/superferia

Player Movement:
Touch: Use the virtual buttons to move left, right and jump.

Keyboard:
Move left: [A], [ARROW LEFT]
Move right: [D], [ARROW RIGHT]
Jump: [W], [ARROW UP], [SPACE]

You can hide the virtual buttons in the menu option.
